did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.unittitle: Ralph Helsin Speech "Technology and the Unions" Audio-Visual Materials,

did.abstract: A speech recorded for the Center for the Study of Democratic Institutions, a 1/2 tape recording.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: Open reel tape recording of a half-hour speech recorded for the Center for the Study of Democratic Institutions
